title: Ticket #3401: condor_birdwatcher should have an Icon for Owner status
description:
From Klaus at Embrarer:

I would like to suggest to include another Icon in the condor_birdwatcher to differ the Status Claimed from the Status Owner. Today the Icon for status Claimed is used also when the machine is in Status Owner. When in Status Owner, condor_watcher says that the CPU is claimed but nojob claimed this CPU (the owner is claiming the CPU). As Condor has to do with jobs running on the machine, in my oppinion introducing a new icon is appropriate.
